title: Watch face-Individuation
summary: Individuation is a highly customized watch face.Three themes! Pure digital !
description: Version 1.0.3Add new theme "Rainbow" Features:-Super highly customized Android Wear watch face.  -New designed 100% digital style. -Four indicators could be set flexibly for many special options.--Support both round and square watches.-Attention:This time ,the "Rainbow" is main theme will be automatically showing on your watch after installing. If you want to change it, you could  choose other themes the on your phone side.Already feel a bit bored from those dull watch faces? Why don’t you try this one? Definitely different than traditional Facer or Ticker,This is an unique watchface  Android Wear watch face unlike any one you have used before.. As it is not only about the pure digital style but also like a highly customized watchface allows you to do any thing with it such as temperature, date, week, power, weather, steps, and even moon phase! How can you still wait for? Install it right now!More facesIf you like Ticker, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the original watch faces created by Magic team are here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformSupported Devices: Individuation supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.How to use Individuation:  -Install the app from Google Play.-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings. -Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press you smart watch to choose Individuation. Note: Please rate us positive if you like our work.Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.comSeeing more details please refer the below  “Contact us”Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.Tips:✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).2. Uninstall the watch face.3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settingsAttention:- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.Contact us: If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Web:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter:https://twitter.com/MagicWatchfaceAnd more coming ways to find us:Instagram, Pinterest... Thank you for :We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
descriptionHTML:
Version 1.0.3
Add new theme "Rainbow"

Features:

-Super highly customized Android Wear watch face.
-New designed 100% digital style.
-Four indicators could be set flexibly for many special options.
--Support both round and square watches.-

Attention:
This time ,the "Rainbow" is main theme will be automatically showing on your watch after installing. If you want to change it, you could choose other themes the on your phone side.

Already feel a bit bored from those dull watch faces? Why don’t you try this one? Definitely different than traditional Facer or Ticker,This is an unique watchface Android Wear watch face unlike any one you have used before.
. As it is not only about the pure digital style but also like a highly customized watchface allows you to do any thing with it such as temperature, date, week, power, weather, steps, and even moon phase! How can you still wait for? Install it right now!

More faces
If you like Ticker, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the original watch faces created by Magic team are here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform

Supported Devices:

Individuation supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.


How to use Individuation:

-Install the app from Google Play.
-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings.
-Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press you smart watch to choose Individuation.

Note:

Please rate us positive if you like our work.
Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.
Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.

Tips:

✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the watch face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settings

Attention:
- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809

Web:
http://www.magicwatchface.com/

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface

And more coming ways to find us:
Instagram, Pinterest...


Thank you for :
We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
comments: Didn't work at all. Not sure if its just not compatible or what. No customization options. No on phone app so that could see if it was my watch or the app.
Not that exciting. Other watch face apps more creative.
Love it. Really good looking minimalist watchface.

No ambient color It would be so easy for the hour and minute marks to remain colored in ambient mode, but they don't. Boring black and white. Also, I'd love to see one of the indicator options be digital time.

The app description fails to mention that the actual customization options are located in the main Android Wear app. There is NO separate app icon for this watchface on the phone. Needs better documentation on this description page. My two main issues with the design are: 1) It doesn't take the 'flat tire' design of the Moto 360 into account. You lose track of the minute indicator for a full 5 minutes off-screen. 2) While one of the dials can read the current temperature, it is only available in Celsius. We use Fahrenheit here in the US, but this is not an available option. Address these issues (add moto 360 mod that modifies the minute indicator and add Fahrenheit temp to weather), along with better documentation on this page, and it could be a great watchface!
